Meteor.GameEngine

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.GameEngine.GameWindow

  • public class GameWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    GameWindow is a window handling class.
    This class should be used for handling the creation of a window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameWindow(Meteor gameEngine)
      Creates the game window object.
      GameWindow(java.lang.String windowTitle, int windowWidth, int windowHeight, int windowScale)
      Creates the game window object with given title, width, height, and scale.
